Uses of Class
hw4.SimpleElement

Packages that use SimpleElement
Package
Description
hw4
 

  • Uses of SimpleElement in hw4

    Subclasses of SimpleElement in hw4
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AssociatedElement
    An associated element is an abstract base class to classes like FollowerElement or AttachedElement, that are associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or a LiftElement.
    class 
    AttachedElement
    An attached element is one that is associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or a LiftElement.
    class 
    BaseElement
    A base element is an abstract base class to classes like PlatformElement or LiftElement, with two distinctive behaviors.
    class 
    FlyingElement
    Moving element in which the vertical velocity is adjusted each frame by a gravitational constant to simulate gravity.
    class 
    FollowerElement
    A follower element is one that is associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or LiftElement.
    class 
    LiftElement
    An element with two distinctive behaviors.
    class 
    MovingElement
    An element in which the update method updates the position each frame according to a velocity vector (deltaX, deltaY).
    class 
    PlatformElement
    A PlatformElement is an element with two distinctive behaviors.
    class 
    VanishingElement
    An element that does not move.
